fn.p: Edited by: Andrew M. Janczak, Norwegian University of Life Sciences, Norway
Reviewed by: Joergen B. Kjaer, Friedrich Loeffler Institut, Germany; Valentina Ferrante, University of Milan, Italy; Judit Vas, Norwegian University of Life Sciences, Norway
This article was submitted to Animal Behavior and Welfare, a section of the journal Frontiers in Veterinary Science
